decisions.description: GTMS-28936 | This decision element filters the records to be displayed in the data table, allowing only Sourced CRs and Influence CRs for which the associated Partner Engagement (PE) record has 'AE_Influence_Confirmation_Required__c' set to true.

Flow.description: created for GTMS-26109/GTMS-26110 Partners Project H1 Added Partner deactivated check, GTMS-26100 GTMS-28152 | Changes made to remove the Reject Partner email notification from this flow to Partners Channel Relationship Scheduled Emails GTMS-28150: Updated logic to update the influence criteria fields for the selected records and provided feasibility for inline editing for influence criteria fields GTMS-28301: Email notifications sent to customer contact instead of partner GTMS-28680: Added "Partner Expansion" engagment type in the query where condition GTMS-28936 | Checks the Require_AE_Influence_Confirmation__c flag on the PE to determine whether AE confirmation is required for the Influence CR GTMS-29375 | Determines if the opportunity has a Channel Relationship and whether to display the table for Confirm Influence Partner.
Flow.label: Confirm Influence - Partner

fields.name: ApprovePartnerEngagement
fields.fieldText:
Approve Partner Engagement: Did the partner add the indicated value?


Below is a list of Partners engaged on this opportunity. Please select all Partners that should be approved based on their intended contributions and then click "Next". 


Note: Denying partner influence will prompt notifications for PAM review but will not interrupt the closing process. Please see Guidance for AE Review for more information.

fields.name: InfluenceDetails
fields.fieldText: Please confirm if partner {!Get_CR_Details.Channel_Partner__r.Name} has met the influence requirements: {!Get_CR_Details.Partner_Opportunity_Description__c}
